resources.string:
Hello Friends, Welcome you to Ladies Club. This channel is specially made for all the Ladies who wants to learn something new every day. We make videos regarding Hair Style, Saree design, Silk Thread Jewellery, Cooking, Mehandi Design, Rangoli Design, using waste material to do useful item etc and also whatever suggestions, requests made by you also We will try to do.
 	 This Club provides the act of turning new and imaginative ideas into Reality. Join the Club today and make it Successful.


To order Silk Thread Jewellery Kindly contact on whatsapp no : 8956024239


For Business Enquiry Email us : ladies4club@gmail.com
